title: out of date home page

creator: josh_vane

title: Does Firefox allow/support Total Adblock ?
content: I used Total Adblock on Firefox for a whole year successfully then suddenly Total Adblock did not work (even after I paid the yearly fee for that service). Then Total Adblock claimed Firefox would not allow/support Total Adblock, BUT WAS WORKING WITH MOZILLA TO MAKE THIS HAPPEN. Is this true ?? When, if ever, will Firefox allow/support Total Adblock ? I HATE ADS +++ Please inform me re this issue ASAP. Many Many Thanks WIN
creator: elwinthedoc

title: Widevine CDM plugin crashing all year now, x64 bit, dev tools, never any issues, etc.
content:
Whenever viewing 'any' DRM content protected with widevine plugin, the plugin simply crashes. I've gone over some Ubuntu related solutions that don't apply to windows, not sure how to fix this.

I have latest everything and no incompatibilities with any software/thing until now with this: Firefox 116.0.3 (64-bit) (20230815173142) Windows 10 x64 latest Widevine Content Decryption Module provided by Google Inc. File: 4.10.2557.0

I've deleted all the Widevine folders and had Firefox re-install the folders/files for me automatically, same issue occurs.

There's no other information, I just clicked send crash report. It started happening some time late in 2022.
creator: jurugi

title: Firefox loads slow on left click or enter
content: Firefox loads slow on left click or enter but only on google or webtoons as far as I am aware. Right click still works on those sites to load at a normal speed but otherwise it freezes for 10 seconds or so then loads.
creator: deadpyrox
